title: Black Screen after launch
body:
We have tried every suggestion for this error, (reinstalling, getting a new launcher, new client, reinstalling adobe AIR etc.) and none have worked, so we decided to post here. Our problem is that every time the we press Launch it comes up with the picture shown below/above. We hope you have a fix for us. Thank you.
EDIT: The patch version is 5.7.

replies.body: Uninstall AVG if you have it.
